name: The Moore Contingency
description:
*An engineer must go deep into a super AI gone wrong depths and put an end to it*

Isaac Aran is a computer engineer in a far future where they have evolved so much and become so big but still get obsolete faster and faster. The supercomputer components must be manually plugged in to shut them down. Dive in with your cable, place beacons along the way to lengthen your rope, and connect it to the AI critical points.



## Staff - "Plancha Corp"

* Agloo- *Cover 2D*

* Amalia - *Environment Art*

* Atom - *2D Art/UI*

* Greet - *Level/Design/Lighting*

* Octavien - *Music Composer*

* Raiponz - *Development among other things*

* Zessirb - *Development and stuff*

## Bindings

Move your character using AD or left and right arrow key.

Adjust rope length with WS or up and down arrow.

Jump with space bar

Place new beacons with Control.

Use escape to go back to the level selection screen.

##FIX 01

- Added webgl build
- Fixed missing wall tile in level 3
- Binded escape key to return to main menu
- Fixed main menu appearance
